name: kiro-discord-presence
description: Discord Rich Presence for Kiro IDE (and VS Code) with privacy-first defaults.

kiroPresence.privacyMode.description: When enabled, do not show filenames, workspace names, or git data, regardless of other settings.

kiroPresence.discordClientId.description: Discord Application Client ID used for Rich Presence. Required for activity to display icons/buttons.

kiroPresence.showFileName.description: Show the active file name in presence (redacts by default).

kiroPresence.showWorkspaceName.description: Show the workspace or repository name in presence.

kiroPresence.idleTimeoutMs.description: After this idle time, switch to an idle presence.

kiroPresence.showElapsedTime.description: Show elapsed time since session start.

kiroPresence.resetElapsedTimePerFile.description: Reset elapsed time when switching files.

kiroPresence.buttons.enableRepositoryBut.description: Show a 'View Project' button when a VCS remote URL is detected.

kiroPresence.redactPatterns.description: Glob patterns of files to always redact from presence.

kiroPresence.largeImage.description: Pick which large image key to use for presence assets.

kiroPresence.showProblems.description: Append problems (errors/warnings) count to presence state.

kiroPresence.showGitBranch.description: Append current Git branch to presence state (uses built-in Git extension when available).

kiroPresence.showCursorPosition.description: Append current cursor position (line/column) to presence state.

kiroPresence.debug.description: Enable verbose logging in the extension host.
